summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sentient Tracker Arctic Shift integration - high-signal post selection, comment sampling, and AI summarization with evidence links. All 12 backend tests passed. Frontend correctly displays Comments stat, Debug Info panel, and evidence links for pain points and wins.
passed_tests: GET /api/games/{id}/latest-result returns scan with comments_sampled field
Scan result includes debug_info with window_used, raw_post_count, after_quality_filter, final_post_count, comments_fetched_for, total_comments
Pain points have 'text' and 'evidence' fields with Reddit links
Wins have 'text' and 'evidence' fields with Reddit links
Quality filter reduces post count (100 raw -> 85 after filter)
Scan throttling prevents scans within 30 seconds
Cache status endpoint works (10 min TTL)
Source posts have permalinks to Reddit
Frontend shows evidence links [source 1] [source 2] under pain points
Frontend shows evidence links [source 1] [source 2] under wins
Frontend Debug Info panel shows all required fields
seed_data_creation: Used existing test user and game from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Arctic Shift API integration is working. Backend fetches posts from 8d..36h window, applies quality filter, fetches comments for top 15 posts, and AI generates pain_points/wins with evidence links. Frontend displays all data correctly including Comments stat card and evidence links.

verified_requirements.post_selection_quality_filtering: PASS - 100 raw posts filtered to 85 after quality filter
verified_requirements.diversity_caps: PASS - Max 3 posts per author, max 25 no-comment posts
verified_requirements.comment_sampling: PASS - Comments fetched for top 15 posts (148 total comments)
verified_requirements.ai_summarization_with_evidence: PASS - Pain points and wins have text and evidence fields
verified_requirements.caching_10_min_ttl: PASS - Cache status endpoint confirms 10-min TTL
verified_requirements.throttling_30_seconds: PASS - Scan attempts within 30s are throttled
verified_requirements.debug_info_fields: PASS - All fields present: window_used, raw_post_count, after_quality_filter, final_post_count, comments_fetched_for, total_comments
